subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
Video Recordings and Downloads
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: When Gilles Simon faces Roger Federer on Sunday in the French Open, he will have the benefit of extensive video analysis of Federer’s tactical patterns and tendencies.
snippet: When Gilles Simon faces Roger Federer on Sunday in the French Open, he will have the benefit of extensive video analysis of Federer’s tactical patterns and tendencies.
